metadata.description: After earning the highest arrest rate， and catching some of the worst criminals in his district， Gene is the pride of the NYPD. Long eyelashes hem his grey eyes， and red lips match his skin for beauty. People are drawn to him the moment they see him， but usually he’s a "lazy cat" who gets tired of people easily. Together with his partner and slave (?) Glenn， he solves strange mysteries! Enjoy this erotic yaoi mystery! This is a yaoi anthology containing the three parts of this series and a romantic story set in the Taisho Period!
metadata.name: Mask (Yaoi Manga)
